content: originally from peterson s magazine volume 45 march 1864 my adapted version of this historical crochet pattern worked top down it s essentially a granny stripe triangle shawl and is very easy to customise finished measurements neck width 26 in shawl length 21 5 in not including 6 in fringe original pattern illustration- https //babel hathitrust org/cgi/pt id=mdp 39015069380478&view=page&seq=183 pattern- https //babel hathitrust org/cgi/pt id=mdp 39015069380478&view=page&seq=244 --- a video tutorial for this pattern can be found here https //youtu be/jfvdszo6i_c
